mapper.select: SELECT employee_id FROM employee ORDER BY employee_id DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO language_ability ( language_ability_id, employee_id, language, test_name, official_score, acquisition_date1, reading_ability, writing_ability, speaking_ability ) VALUES ( language_ability_seq.NEXTVAL, #{employeeId}, #{language}, #{testName}, #{officialScore}, #{acquisitionDate1}, #{readingAbility}, #{writingAbility}, #{speakingAbility} )

INSERT INTO training ( training_id, employee_id, training_type, training_name, training_start_date, training_end_date, training_organization, training_cost, refundable_training_cost ) VALUES ( training_seq.NEXTVAL, #{employeeId}, #{trainingType}, #{trainingName}, #{trainingStartDate}, #{trainingEndDate}, #{trainingOrganization}, #{trainingCost}, #{refundableTrainingCost} )

INSERT INTO reward_penalty ( reward_penalty_id, employee_id, reward_penalty_type, reward_penalty_name, reward_penalty_giver, reward_penalty_date, reward_penalty_description, remarks2 ) VALUES ( rewardpenalty_seq.NEXTVAL, #{employeeId}, #{rewardPenaltyType}, #{rewardPenaltyName}, #{rewardPenaltyGiver}, #{rewardPenaltyDate}, #{rewardPenaltyDescription}, #{remarks2} )

INSERT INTO referrer ( referrer_id, employee_id, referrer_name, referrer_relationship, referrer_company_name, referrer_position, referrer_phone_number ) VALUES ( referrer_seq.NEXTVAL, #{employeeId}, #{referrerName}, #{referrerRelationship}, #{referrerCompanyName}, #{referrerPosition}, #{referrerPhoneNumber} )

INSERT INTO insurance ( insurance_id, employee_id, insurance_agency, insurance_number, insurance_amount, insurance_start_date, insurance_end_date, remarks4 ) VALUES ( insurance_seq.NEXTVAL, #{employeeId}, #{insuranceAgency}, #{insuranceNumber}, #{insuranceAmount}, #{insuranceStartDate}, #{insuranceEndDate}, #{remarks4} )

INSERT INTO guarantor ( guarantor_id, employee_id, guarantor_name, guarantor_relationship, guarantor_resident_number, guarantee_amount, guarantee_date, guarantee_expiration_date, guarantor_phone_number ) VALUES ( guarantor_seq.NEXTVAL, #{employeeId}, #{guarantorName}, #{guarantorRelationship}, #{guarantorResidentNumber}, #{guaranteeAmount}, #{guaranteeDate}, #{guaranteeExpirationDate}, #{guarantorPhoneNumber} )
